She has been doing this work for several years and it is going well. Maynelly works from 9 to 11 in the morning every day. At this time, Maynelly needs a loan to buy watermelons. Her dream is to buy a cart for selling salchipapas and pollopapas [Peruvian fast food].

loans.use: to buy watermelons

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 8 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: La Sra. Cristina tiene como actividad la carpintería actividad que realiza juntamente con su esposo quien es carpintero, juntos realizan diferentes trabajos para vender y también a pedido, el momento de la visita se encontraba realizando juegos de comedor  los cuales la comercializa en diferentes lugares, esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingreso para ellos, en esta ocasión solicitan financiamiento para la compra de madera para cubrir la demanda actual que tiene, la señora Cristina aprendió esta actividad de su esposo ayudándole, ella es una persona muy trabajadora dinámica con ganas de superación agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Ms. Cristina is a carpenter. She does this work alongside her husband, who is also a carpenter. Together, they build different pieces to sell. They also work on orders. At the time when Emprender visited them, they were working on dining sets that they planned to sell in different places. This work is their principal source of income. At this time, they are requesting a loan to buy wood to cover their current demand. Ms. Cristina learned carpentry through helping her husband. She is a very hard-working, dynamic person with a great desire to improve. She is very grateful for the support being offered to her.

loans.use: to buy materials (wood)

loans.name: 3 De Junio Group

texts.es:
El Comité 3 de Junio de la ciudad de Villa Elisa cuenta con 15 integrantes, están en el tercer ciclo. Se reúnen en forma semanal en la casa de la secretaria , momento en el cual comparten ideas a realizar para las actividades así como también para resolver las posibles desavenencias. Todas las integrantes del grupo se muestran solidarias y con ganas de salir adelante.
La señora Adela ella vive en su humilde casita con su marido e hijos y tiene su pequeña despensa que quiere ir agrandando a través de los ciclos. Ella desea salir siempre adelante con sus microemprendimientos y sacar adelante también a su familia. Comenta que todo el sacrificio que hace es por un futuro mejor para sus hijos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas y demás para el abastecimiento del local. Esta con las esperanzas puestas en el crédito, ya que sabe que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The “Comite 3 de Junio” (June 3rd Committee) from Villa Elisa city has 15 members and they are in their 3rd loan cycle. They meet weekly in the secretary's house, where they share ideas for activities to carry out, as well as to resolve any possible disagreements. All the members of the group demonstrate solidarity and the desire to move ahead.

Mrs. Adela lives in a humble little house with her husband and children and she has a small store that she wants to continue growing through the loan cycles. She wants to advance always with her micro-enterprise and to advance her family as well. She comments that all of the sacrifices she makes are for a better future for her children.

Adela is requesting a loan to buy groceries, drinks, garden vegetables, and other items to resupply her store. She has her hopes placed on the loan, since she knows that it will be a great help.

loans.use: buy groceries, drinks, garden vegetables,and other store supplies.

loans.name: Diane

texts.en:
Diane’s love for fashion inspired her to launch her own clothing business and clothing line called N.G.U. She has been working with 2 manufacturers, one from China and one from New York, to produce the samples. 

In 2010, Diane’s life drastically changed when she was diagnosed with a very rare nerve disorder. After her diagnosis, she went through brain surgery and then recovery.  With the help of her husband, Diane was able to go back to her job, work full-time again and prepare the new clothing line for fall 2011. She already has 10 boutiques ready to distribute her fall collections. In order to increase the advertising for her new collection, she participated in a fashion show in Chicago in May, will produce a commercial and work with a PR agency to brand the N.G.U. collection.

With this loan from ACCION USA, Diane will be producing a new line of clothing in time for her September clothing launch. Diane is very excited about her clothing line and grateful that her good health can’t get in the way of her productivity!

To learn more about Diane’s business, please visit: www.stylesofimagination.com

loans.use: to pay for and produce a new line of clothing for her September clothing launch.

loans.name: Ana Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana Lilian de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive con su hijo y su hermano; ella posee una venta de atoles los cuales tienen un sabor exquisito, ella ha devuelto el sabor tradicional al paladar de sus clientes, por ello la prefieren, los prepara todos los días por la tarde para que las personas  lo disfruten; se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque lo vende a precio accesible y es de calidad además les da un servicio excelente, siempre está feliz para recibir a los clientes. Ana Lilian es muy decidida y está dispuesta a ver crecer su negocio para ella la lucha diaria es la madre de todas las cosas, sus ganas de salir adelante la impulsaron a solicitar a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima por mayor como semilla de marañón, maíz, piña, elotes entre otros para estar a la expectativa del cliente en todo momento y poder satisfacer sus necesidades. Ana Lilian tiene fe que su esfuerzo logre darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Ana Lilian is 43 years old and lives with her son and her brother. She sells atole [a hot corn-based drink] and hers has an exquisite taste. She has returned the traditional flavor to her customers' palates and for this they prefer her. She prepares her atole every day in the afternoon so that people can enjoy it. She has amassed many customers because she sells her product at an accessible price and it is of a high quality. Furthermore, she provides excellent service - she is always happy to receive her customers. Ana Lilian is very determined and is ready to see her business grow. For her, the daily struggle is the mother of all things. Her desire to get ahead compelled her to request a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to purchase ingredients wholesale, such as cashews, pineapple, and different types of corn. This way, she can be ready for her customers at all times and she will be able to satisfy their needs. Ana Lilian has faith that her efforts will succeed in giving her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like cashews, pineapple and different types of corn

loans.name: Sayra Esmelin

texts.en: Sayra lives in the outskirts of Danli, Honduras with her husband and son. She is a returning client and used her most recent credit to open up a small general store. Since then the shop has expanded and built up a good customer base. Sayra is now requesting a loan of 12,000 HNL to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.use: to purchase beans, rice, cornmeal, eggs, snacks, candy, soft drinks, lard, oil, household cleaning products, and personal hygiene products.

loans.name: Womens In Business Group

texts.en:
Mamusu is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. She is 32 years old and was born in Kenema city. She is married to a businessman and the couple has 2 children who are attending primary and secondary schools, respectively.

Mamusu has had 18 years of experience in her business. Currently she sells shoes, underwear, bras, cotton cloths, napkins, etc.  Mamusa and the partners in her group have requested for this loan in order to buy more goods for their businesses. The three women are confident their sales and profit margin will increase and their living standards will also improve. Mamusu is going to use her share of the loan to buy more of the above-mentioned items, in bulk, to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy shoes, underwear, bras, cotton cloths, napkins, etc., in bulk, to add to her business.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 35 años de edad. Es una mujer soltera y muy conocida en la zona por sus buenas referencias personales y laborales. Rosa vive en el distrito de Cayalti, en casa propia.

Rosa se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en un pequeño espacio acondicionado en el interior de su hogar. Además, desde hace 10 años cría animales de corral para venderlos.

Rosa es una mujer humilde con deseos de superación y ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un  crédito de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mercadería (arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, etc.) para su negocio y alimento balanceado para sus animales. Rosa espera mejorar sus ventas y crecer en su actividad, para poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa, 35, is single and a very well known woman in the area due to her good personal and work references.  She lives in her own house in Cayaltí District.

Rosa sells groceries in a small space that she equipped to do so in her house.  In addition, she’s been raising small farm animals to sell for the last ten years.

Rosa is a humble woman with a strong wish to improve and has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy merchandise (rice, sugar, oil, milk, etc.) for her store and nutritionally balanced feed for her animals.  Rosa hopes to improve sales and grow in business to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy groceries and nutritionally balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Irene Rosario

texts.es: La Señora Rosario de 47 años de edad convive con el sr. Antonio hace mas de 25 años tiene cinco hijos los cuales tres son independientes, La Sra.  Rosario mas conocida como Charito vive en la zona los lote la Sra. Rosario trabaja como ambulante hace 23 años vendiendo (toallas para baño, toallas de cocina, pañuelos, medias y otros de acuerdo a la temporada tiene variedad de mercadería). El crédito que se te otorgo es para la compra de mas mercadería (compra de chompas, bufandas y otros) El cliente agradeció infinitamente a la institución por la agilidad y eficiencia que se le atiende siempre ya que ella es cliente antigua en la Institución.
texts.en:
Ms. Rosario, 47, has lived with Mr. Antonio for more than 25 years and they have five children together. Three of their children are independent now. Ms. Rosario, better known as "Charito," lives in the Los Lote zone. She has worked as an itinerant vendor for 23 years. She sells bath towels, kitchen towels,  handkerchiefs, hosiery, and other merchandise that varies depending on the season.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy more merchandise, such as jackets, scarves, and other items. Rosario is infinitely grateful to Emprender for the ease and efficiency with which her loan requests have been handled, as she is an old client of the organization.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like jackets and scarves

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 9 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.es: Jacqueline tiene 40 años, es natural de Sicaya  y en la actualidad vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en la casa que heredó de sus padres. A lo largo de su vida aprendió todas las técnicas agrícolas y ganaderas,  hoy en día  siembra maíz, papa y alfalfa, productos que vende cada mes, del mismo modo cría ovejas que también son vendidos para tener ingresos importante para el bienestar de su familia. Manifiesta que le agrada su trabajo porque siempre tiene productos disponibles para vender así como para su propio consumo. Tiene deseos de adquirir más terrenos y aumentar su producción agrícola así como el de tener más animales ovinos. Supo de MFP por medio de su vecina que la invito a formar parte del banco comunal a la que integra, es relativamente nueva en su grupo porque esta es la segunda vez que solicita un crédito, de las cuales ha sabido ganarse la confianza de los demás socios con la puntualidad en sus pagos. En esta ocasión el crédito que solicita, comprará sacos de abono orgánico para sembrar alfalfa y maíz.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is 40 years old and a native of Sicaya. She currently lives with her husband and their two children in the house that she inherited from her parents. Throughout her life, she learned the techniques of agriculture and raising cattle. Today, she plants corn, potatoes and alfalfa, all products that she sells each month. She also raises sheep and sells them to earn income that is important for the well-being of her family.

Jacqueline says that she is pleased with her work because she always has products available to sell or for her own consumption. She hopes to acquire more land and to increase her agricultural production as well as to have more sheep

Jacqueline learned about Microfinanzas Prisma through her neighbor, who invited her to become part of the communal bank she joined. Jacqueline is relatively new to her group because this is only the second time she has requested a loan, but she has already earned the confidence of her fellow group members due to her punctual repayments. This time, she will use her loan to buy sacks of organic fertilizer for planting alfalfa and corn.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Bokk  Jom Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Bokk Jom est créé depuis le 28 décembre 2010, il est composé de vingt sept femmes qui sont parentes, amies, voisines et habitent le même village, elles ont comme lien commun le  petit commerce.



Madame Dial la responsable est âgée de 44 ans, mariée, mère de neuf enfants, elle mène une activité de petit commerce de légumes depuis plus de 5 ans, elle fait aussi de l'embouche ovine. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en boubou multicolore, couverte d'un châle et a levé la main gauche.


Elle achéte ses légumes ( carottes, aubergines, choux, navets.....) aux marchés hebdomadaires et revend dans son village.


Avec son prêt elle compte acheter beaucoup de légumes pour augmenter ses gains et des moutons pour l’embouche.


Elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la maison avec ses bénéfices obtenus.
texts.en:
Le groupe de solidarité Bokk Jom est créé depuis le 28 décembre 2010, il est composé de vingt sept femmes qui sont parentes, amies, voisines et habitent le même village, elles ont comme lien commun le  petit commerce.



Madame Dial la responsable est âgée de 44 ans, mariée, mère de neuf enfants, elle mène une activité de petit commerce de légumes depuis plus de 5 ans, elle fait aussi de l'embouche ovine. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en boubou multicolore, couverte d'un châle et a levé la main gauche.


Elle achéte ses légumes ( carottes, aubergines, choux, navets.....) aux marchés hebdomadaires et revend dans son village.


Avec son prêt elle compte acheter beaucoup de légumes pour augmenter ses gains et des moutons pour l’embouche.


Elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la maison avec ses bénéfices obtenus.

loans.use: Acheter des légumes destinés à la vente.

loans.name: Hilda Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia es una mujer soltera de 24 años de edad que vive en la parte rural del distrito de Mochumi, en casa de su madre. Alicia es conocida en la zona por ser una persona trabajadora y emprendedora.

Alicia cuenta con un puesto de venta de útiles escolares en su zona. Este puesto tiene gran demanda pues es uno de los más surtidos de la comunidad. Además, Alicia vende productos de belleza por catálogo. Estas actividades la viene desarrollando desde hace 3 años, en su domicilio,  y cuenta con clientela establecida en la zona.

Alicia solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mercadería que le permita satisfacer su demanda. Así como, cosméticos en oferta para obtener mayores ganancias. Ella contará con los productos a la mano para hacer sus ventas instantáneamente, sin la necesidad de esperar a que estos sean pedidos y traídos.

Alicia es una clienta conocida para nuestra entidad y este crédito le sería de gran utilidad.
texts.en:
Alicia, 24, is a single mother living in her mother’s house in the rural part of Mochumi District.  Alicia is known in the area for being a hard working, enterprising person.

Alicia has a stand where she sells school supplies in her zone.  There is quite a bit of demand at her stand because it’s one of the best stocked in the community.  In addition, Alicia sells cosmetics via catalogue.  She’s been carrying out these activities at home for the last three years and has a well-established local clientele.

Alicia is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan to buy merchandise that will make it possible for her to meet demand as well as to buy cosmetics that are on special offer so that her profits will be higher.  She will have stock on hand so that her sales can be instantaneous without having to wait for the orders to be placed and delivered.

Alicia is a well known client of our firm and this loan will be of great use to her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise that's on sale.

loans.name: Sèyivè

texts.fr: Sèyivè est âgé de 41 ans et est père de cinq enfants, tous scolarisés. Sèyivè est un veuf vivant seul avec ses enfants dans une ville du Bénin. Sèyivè assure seul les diverses charges de la famille grâce au revenu que lui procure son activité. Sèyivè est un électronicien qui a son atelier situé dans une ville du Bénin. Sèyivè  achète ses produits au Nigeria, État voisin du Bénin. Sèyivè a besoin de mieux équiper son atelier par l'acquisition de pièces de rechange, ce qui lui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle et par ricochet, d'accroître sa clientèle et son revenu. Pour ce faire, Sèyivè sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé, en vue de mieux répondre aux exigence de sa clientèle. Les deux premiers crédits dont Sèyivè avait bénéficié ont été tous bien remboursés. Dans l'avenir, Sèyivè souhaiterait acquérir une parcelle.
texts.en: Sèyivè is 41 years old and has five children, all in school. He is a widower and lives by himself with his children in a city in Benin. He provides for the family by himself, thanks to the income he earns from his business. Sèyivè is an electronics engineer and has his own workshop located in a city in Benin. He buys his products in Nigeria, a country bordering Benin. Sèyivè needs to better equip his workshop by buying spare parts, which will allow him to better satisfy his customers and, by extension, increase his clientele and income. To do this, he is seeking his third loan with ALIDÉ, with the goal of better responding to the demands of his clientele. The two previous loans Sèyivè has benefited from were both repaid properly. In the future, Sèyivè hopes to acquire a plot of land.

loans.use: To buy spare parts.

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 10 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: Carmen Herminia

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 31 años de edad, es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. Carmen es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchos deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus padres.

Carmen se dedica a la venta de productos para relleno de piñatas y otros materiales para realizar manualidades. Ella cuenta con un pequeño puesto en su domicilio y realiza esta actividad desde hace 2 años. Carmen atiende todos los días de la semana a una clientela fija.

Carmen desea invertir en su negocio para mejorar sus ventas y ampliarlo, en un futuro. Es por ello que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles para comprar nueva mercadería y  ofrecer materiales de  decoración y eventos infantiles. 

Carmen es una clienta conocida de nuestra entidad y tiene buenas referencias.
texts.en:
Carmen, 31, is single and lives in her parents' house in the district of Tambogrande-Piura. Carmen is a hardworking woman who wants to improve the quality of life for herself and her parents.

Carmen sells products to fill piñatas and other materials for crafts. She has had a small store in her home for 2 years. She is open everyday to a fixed clientele. 

Carmen wants to invest in her business to grow it and improve her sales in the future. For that reason she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1200 nuevos soles to buy new merchandise and offer decorations and children's events. 

Carmen is a well-known client of this institution and has good references.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for decorations and children's parties.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more clothes for resale.

loans.name: Benedicto

texts.es: Benedicto, tiene la edad de 65 años, esta soltero  y vive solo actualmente. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la siembra de café. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la siembra de este cultivo por lo cual está invirtiendo en ese nuevo proyecto Cafetalero. El quiere tener el terreno produciendo para su bienestar propio y generar las ganancias para los pagos de su crédito. El piensa en asegurarse su futuro económico con este nuevo proyecto de siembra de cafe y sacarle todas las ganancias que se puedan para completar todas sus metas a largo plazo que tiene como persona. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Benedicto is 65 years old, single, and currently lives alone. He will use this loan to purchase supplies for planting coffee. He decided to invest in this new coffee project because he has enough suitable land for planting this crop. He would like to have his land producing for his own well-being and to generate income to repay his loan. He is thinking about securing his economic future with this new coffee-planting project and he would like to use the profits to complete all of the long-term goals he has as a person.

This is the first loan Benedicto has received through FUDECOSUR. He has never had previous loans through the state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him this loan with greater ease and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant coffee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more clothes and shop items for resale.

loans.name: Virgen De Caacupe Group

texts.es:
Virgen de Caacupé, es el comité formado por 19 mujeres de Ciudad del Este, lleva este nombre en honor a la Santa patrona del País. Actualmente se encuentra en el primer ciclo. Manifiestan estar muy a gusto del programa. ya que se sienten realizadas y muy satisfechas. Se definen como mujeres trabajadoras y luchadoras, dicen que lo que las motivo a formarse en un comité es la obtener mayores ingresos para cada una de ellas, con lo cual ayudaran a sus familias. Pero no ven solo el aspecto económico, sino también el aspecto integral de cada una de las miembros.
La Sra. Gabina se dedica a la elaboración y venta de alimentos, desde hace ya unos años. Manifiesta que tiene un grupo bien formado de clientes que siempre vienen a comprar de ella. Manifiesta que tiene mucha demanda, en especial para la hora del almuerzo. Sueña con tener un local propio donde ofrecer a las personas mejor servicio.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de los ingrediente que va a necesitar para la elaboración de sus comidas, como ser carne, hortalizas, fideos y demás.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Virgen de Caacupé" is made up of 19 women from Ciudad del Este.  The group carries this name in honor of the patron saint of the country.  Now they are in their first loan cycle.  They state that they are very pleased with the program, because they feel accomplished and very satisfied.  They describe themselves as tenacious and hardworking women, and they say that they were motivated to form this group so that they could obtain higher earnings for each of them, and help their families.  But they don't see only economic benefits, but rather comprehensive benefits that accrue to each of the members. 

 Gabina has a business making and selling food that she has had for several years.  She states that she has an established base of customers who always come to buy from her.  She says that she has a lot of demand, especially at lunchtime.  She dreams of having her own restaurant where she could offer her customers better service.

Gabina requests a loan to buy ingredients that she will use in making her food, such as: meat, vegetables, noodles and other items.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, noodles, and other products

loans.name: Renulfo

texts.es:
Renulfo es un señor casado, de 60 años de edad, que vive en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. La calidad de vida de Renulfo no es la adecuada pues su casa no cuenta con los servicios básicos de saneamiento.

Renulfo es un hombre trabajador que se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en un espacio acondicionado al interior de su sala. Además, cría aves de corral para venderlas y trabaja como peón agrícola. Su esposa lo apoya en las actividades que realiza, creando así una buena relación familiar.

Renullfo tiene muchos deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida y desea invertir en su negocio para obtener mayores ganancias que le permitan cumplir su objetivo.

Renulfo solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mercadería para surtir su bodega. Estas ventas le permitirán hacer mejoras en su domicilio y crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Renulfo, 60, is married and lives in the rural part of Tambogrande-Piura District.  Renulfo’s quality of life isn’t adequate because his house does not have basic sanitary services.

Renulfo is a hard working man who sells basic need items in a space equipped to do so in his house.  In addition, he raises barnyard fowl to sell and works as a field hand.  His wife supports his efforts and they form a good family relationship.

Renulfo very much wants to improve his quality of life and wants to invest in the business to obtain more profits that will allow him to reach his objective.

Renulfo is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to buy merchandise to stock his store.  Sales will make it possible for him to make home improvements and to grow in business.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Kasundra

texts.en:
Kasundra has been running her beauty spa for almost four years. She has taken her business to the next level by placing a greater emphasis on marketing and social media, specifically creating a monthly newsletter for clients to keep them informed of the new treatments and specials she offers. She has quarterly deals with coupon websites to attract new clients and hopes to obtain some repeat customers.

With this loan from ACCION USA, Kasundra will make improvements to her website; purchase marketing materials, including t-shirts; and get equipment for an additional employee. Kasundra is very excited about sharing her small business experience on Kiva.

loans.use: to make improvements to her website; purchase marketing materials, including t-shirts; and get equipment for an additional employee

loans.name: Abigail

texts.es: La señorita Abigail oriunda de Santa Cruz, es estudiante universitaria, vive en el domicilio de su tío se encuentra ubicado en la zona villa olímpica, ella recibe diario renta de su vehículo que lo hace trabajar con un chofer y con esto mantiene sus estudios, ya  hace dos años, el destino del crédito es para la refacción y mantenimiento de su vehículo, el deseo de la señorita Abigail es terminar sus estudios y ser una buena profesional, se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Abigail is a native of Santa Cruz. She is a university student and lives in her uncle's home in the Villa Olímpica zone. She receives daily income from her vehicle, which she rents out to a driver. This is how she has paid for her studies for two years now. This loan will be used for repairs and maintenance of her vehicle. Abigail hopes to finish her studies and to be a good professional. She feels grateful for the support she is being offered.

loans.use: to perform repairs and maintenance on her vehicle

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 29 años de edad. Esta casada y tiene dos hijos. Rosa y su familia viven en casa propia ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de  Lambayeque, en una comunidad pequeña y humilde ubicada a 20 minutos de la ciudad.

Rosa se dedica, desde hace 5 años, a la crianza y venta de aves de corral. Esta actividad la desarrolla en su propio domicilio y cuenta con una gran experiencia y clientela. 

Rosa tiene muchos deseos de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Es por ello que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo  de 2000 nuevos soles para invertir  en la compra de pavos y gallinas y en el alimento balanceado que estos requieren, para poder tener una crianza optima que le permita venderlos a mejores precios y así crecer en su actividad.

Rosa es una clienta conocida para nuestra entidad que ha demostrado responsabilidad en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 29 years old. She is married and has two children. Rosa and her family live in their own house in the rural area of the district of Lambayeque, in a small and humble community located 20 minutes from the city.

Rosa has been raising and selling poultry for five years. She performs this work at her own home and has a great deal of experience and many customers.

Rosa has a great desire to improve her family's quality of life. This is why she is requesting a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She will invest it in the purchase of turkeys and chickens and to provide them with the balanced diet they need, so that they can have an optimal upbringing that will allow her to sell them for better prices and therefore to grow her business.

Rosa is a familiar client of Edpyme Alternativa who has shown responsibility in making her repayments.

loans.use: to buy turkeys, chickens, and a balanced diet for them

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 11 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: Covacine  Ide  Ju-Ju

texts.fr:
Femme âgée de 38ans, mariée avec deux enfants dont l’âge varie de 2ans à 18ans. Elle est dans ce commerce de vente de divers et des poissons salés depuis l'an 1993 avec un capital de 130.000frs. Ses recettes journalières  varient de 30.000 à 60.000frs. 

Ce prêt lui permettra d'améliorer la qualité de son activité en achetant 5 cartons de poissons salés soles, 3 cartons de poissons thons, 1 cartons morues et de la tomate fraiche.

Pour la croissance de son commerce, elle vend aux prix hors concurrence afin de mieux attirer la clientèle. 

Elle aimerait etre grossiste , effectuer des voyages afin d’importer le poisson sale du Portugal et de l'Espagne et avec ses benefices  s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
This lady is married, 38 years old and has 2 children aged 2 and 18. She has been selling various items and salted fish since 1993, with a capital of 130,000 CFA francs. Her daily revenue varies between 30,000 and 60,000 francs.

This loan will allow her to improve the quality of her business by buying 5 boxes of salted sole fish, 3 boxes of tuna, 1 box of cod and fresh tomatoes. To increase business, she sells at prices that cannot be beat in order to attract customers. She would like to be a wholesaler, to travel in order to buy salted fish from Spain and Portugal, and buy a piece of land with her profits.

loans.use: to buy 5 boxes of salted sole fish and 3 boxes of tuna fish.

loans.name: Comlan Janvier

texts.fr: Comlan Janvier est âgé de 37 ans et est marié à un certain Yollande. Le couple a trois enfants à charge, tous scolarisés, dont deux sont les leurs. Comlan Janvier vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Comlan Janvier subvient ensemble avec sa femme, aux besoins de la famille. Comlan Janvier a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire, puis a appris l'électronique, une activité qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Comlan Janvier s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. C’est la troisième fois que Comlan Janvier sollicite auprès de ALIDé, un crédit. Ce crédit lui servira à mieux équiper son atelier par l’acquisition de pièces de rechanges électroniques, ce qui lui permettra de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle et donc d'accroître son revenu.
texts.en:
Comlan Janvier is 37 years old and married to a woman named Yollande. They support three children, who are all in school. Two of the children are their own. He lives together with his wife and children. Together with his wife, he meets the needs of his family. 

Comlan Janvier dropped out of secondary school and then learned about electronics. This work enables him to support himself and his children. He gets his supplies from a city in Benin. 

This is the third time that he has requested an ALIDé loan, which will serve to acquire electronic replacement parts allowing him to respond better to the demands of his customers and therefore to increase his revenues.

loans.use: to buy electronic replacement parts

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda tiene 39 años de edad y es una madre de familia trabajadora y amorosa. Sus hijos tienen 7 y 1 año de edad. Nilda y su familia viven en una comunidad rural, humilde y en vías de desarrollo en el distrito de Paiján – La Libertad.

Nilda cuenta con una bodega en la que vende abarrotes (aceite, azúcar, arroz, café, etc.), alimentos de primera necesidad, golosinas y bebidas. Su tienda es una de las mas surtidas en su comunidad y por eso cuenta con clientela establecida en la zona. El negocio de Nilda goza de un buen desarrollo  y por eso desea invertir en él. 

Nilda solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mercadería y seguir surtiendo su negocio ya que este tiene gran demanda. Esto le permitirá seguir creciendo en su actividad y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nilda, 39, is a loving, hard working mother.  Her children are 7 and 1 years old.  Nilda and her family live in a rural, humble community that’s starting to develop in Paiján – La Libertad District.

Nilda has a store where she sells groceries (oil, sugar, rice, coffee, etc.), basic need foodstuffs, snacks and soft-drinks.  Her store is one of the better stocked ones in her community so she has a well-established local clientele.  Nilda’s store is enjoying good growth and that’s why she wants to invest in it.

Nilda is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan to buy merchandise to continue stocking her store since it has quite a large demand.  This will allow her to continue to grow in her business and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy groceries, snacks and beverages for the store.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz es una señora D. 66 años D. edad que vive en una comunidad urbana en vías D. desarrollo del distrito D. Chiclayo. Ella es conocida en la zona por su buen carácter y cordialidad.

Luz tiene un negocio en su propio domicilio en el que venD. platos D. comida y bebida. Su negocio cuenta con una gran demanda los fines D. semana, siendo uno D. los restaurantes más concurridos D. la localidad. Luz desarrolla esta actividad desD. hace 6 años, lo que le ha dado experiencia y clientela.

Ella solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2000 nuevos soles para mejorar la presentación D. su restaurante. Sobre todo la parte mobiliaria D. este. El préstamo le sería D. gran utilidad pues la ayudaría a ganar clientela nueva y por enD. mejorar sus ventas y calidad D. vida.

Luz es una clienta recurrente D. nuestra entidad y goza D. buenas referencias personales, crediticias y laborales.
texts.en:
Luz is a 66-year-old woman living in an urban community that’s in the midst of developing located in Chiclayo District.  She’s known in the zone for her good character and graciousness.

Luz has a home-based business selling food and beverages.  Her business is in high demand on weekends being one of the most  crowded restaurants in her location.  Luz has been in business for 6 years which has given her experience and clientele

She is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to improve the restaurant’s appearance, especially with respect to the furnishings.  The loan will be of great use to her because it will help her win over customers and thus improve sales and quality of life.

Luz is a recurrent client of our firm and has good personal, credit and work references.

loans.use: to renew the restaurant's furnishings.

loans.name: Elmis

texts.es: Elmis, tiene la edad de 30 años, esta casado  y vive con sus 2 hijo y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos  para la mejora de su cafetal. El cuenta con la plantación de café ya establecida y tiene que asistirlo este año para obtener de el ganancias y una mejor producción. El lo que hará es aplicarle abono y fungicidas para así tener más limpio y  mejor calidad de café producido. El tiene como meta generar ganancias para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar su nivel económico para salir adelante con todas sus metas. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Elmis is 30 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two children, who are his highest priority. He already has an established coffee plantation and needs to tend to it this year in order to obtain the best production and profits. He will apply fertilizer and fungicides in order to keep it cleaner and to produce a better quality coffee. His goal is to create income for the sake of his family's well-being and to improve his economic level in order to make progress towards his goals.

This is the first loan that Elmis has received through FUDECOSUR. He has not had any prior loans through the state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with greater ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee plantation

loans.name: God Help Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the "God Help" group. These are small-scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek  a loan of 800,000 Leones (SLL) each in order to invest in their businesses. 

Thereza is the leader of this group. She is 29 years old and single with one child who is attending primary school. Thereza sells firewood, charcoal, and palm oil. She has been running this business for six years now. With her share of this loan, she is going to buy some gallons of palm oil and a large quantity of charcoal to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy palm oil and charcoal to add to her business

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La señora  Marcelina estudio hasta  la  primaria terminada, se  dedica  a vender tortillas y cenas en la  noche.
Tiene tres hijos todos son varones  a parte  de vender comida  vende calzado por catalogo es una señora muy trabajadora, sus  hijos  le ayudan en los quehaceres  de la  casa  ya que ella en la mañana se dedica a vender el calzado y llegando tiene que preparar las cosas para la  vender en la cena.
Sus hijos le ayudan  atendiendo a los clientes, Marcelina es una señora  que desde  que se caso le ayuda en los gastos a su esposo, le  gusta tener su propio negocio para poder depender de ella misma y no de su esposo.
Pidió el préstamo para  comprar mas  alimentos para  prepararle comidas  diferentes  a sus clientes y les den ganas de volver.
Su mas grande sueño es poner un local de comida para vender  almuerzo, comida y cena, para  seguir ayudando a sus hijos y así puedan terminar sus estudios.
Esta muy contenta por que esta logrando sus sueños gracias a fundación realidad y KIVA, pues ellos apoyan a que todas las mujeres trabajadoras salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Ms. Marcelina completed a primary school education. Now she sells tortillas, as well as suppers at night. She has three children, all sons. Aside from selling food, she also sells shoes by catalog. She is a very hard-working woman and her sons help her with the household tasks since she is out selling shoes in the morning. When she returns, she has to prepare things for selling dinners. Her sons also help her tend to customers.

Marcelina is a woman who has helped her husband with the expenses ever since they were married. She likes having her own business so that she can depend on herself and not on her husband. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more ingredients to prepare various foods, so that her customers will want to return. Her greatest dream is to set up a restaurant where she would sell breakfast, lunch, and dinner, so that she could continue supporting her children until they could finish their studies.

Marcelina is very happy because she is achieving her dreams thanks to Fundación Realidad and Kiva, who provide support so that every hard-working woman can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: God Day Gee Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the “God Day Gee” group from Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. They are businesspeople who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in order to seek a loan of 800,000 Sierra Leons leones (SLL) for each in the group. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, attract more customers, make more sales and profit and consequently, improve their living conditions. 

The leader of this group of entrepreneurs is Mariama. Mariama is 35 years old and was born in the Pujehun district. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a trader, and four of her children are attending primary and secondary school. Mariama has been selling baby clothes, cotton cloths, bed sheets, etc., for eight years now. With her share of this loan, she is going to buy the aforementioned items in large quantities to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy baby clothes, cotton cloths, bed sheets, etc., in large quantities to add to her business.

loans.name: Hilda Teofila

texts.es: La Sra. Hilda es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 30,26,25 años de edad,  Hilda ha sabido salir adelante criando y cuidando a sus tres hijos los cuales ya son independientes, la Sra. Hilda se  dedica al comercio como vendedora de ropa, juguetes, accesorios de cocina etc. También vende productos de belleza de las marcas Esika, Lebel, Cyzone que realiza a pedido de sus clientes, viene desarrollándose en esta actividad más de 2 años; la Sra. Hilda tiene grandes deseos de progresar y salir adelante mejorando su calidad de vida, su sueño de Hilda es tener su propia tienda en su casa para poder así mejorar su negocio, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de mercadería para poder aumentar sus ventas  en los días de fiestas patrias y así aumentar sus ganancias. La Sra. Hilda está muy agradecida por haberle otorgado el crédito.
texts.en:
Ms. Hilda is a single mother of three children, ages 30, 26 and 25.  She has leaned to get ahead while raising and caring for her children who are now independent.  Her business is selling clothing, toys and kitchen accessories.  She also has been selling Esika, Lebel and Cyzone brand beauty products for over two years.

Hilda has a great desire to progress and get ahead in order to improve her lifestyle.  Her goal is to set up her own shop in her house so she can improve her business.  She plans to use the loan to buy more merchandise so she can increase sales, especially during the national holidays.  Hilda is very grateful for receiving this loan.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise to increase sales.

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 12 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cartons of fresh fish

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
La señora  Inés  se dedica a la venta de pollos, ella tiene veintisiete años de edad, desde hace cinco años se ha dedicado a la venta de pollos ya que le deja  muy buenas ganancias, es una señora muy trabajadora a parte de vender pollos se dedica a la venta de calzado por catalogo.
También le ayuda a su hermana a atender su tienda de abarrotes para ganarse un dinero extra, le gusta mucho superarse,  para ofrecerle una mejor vida a su hija Luisa de ocho años de edad .
Esta muy contenta con el apoyo que le ha dado fundación realidad para salir adelante y  engrandecer su negocio.
Ella estudio hasta la primaria terminada, le gustaría que sus hijos  terminen de estudiar  y puedan tener su propio negocio y ver sus ganancias.
Esta agradecida con Fundación Realidad y a KIVA por todo el apoyo brindado cuando mas lo necesitaba
texts.en:
Mrs. Inés, 27, has been selling chicken for five years and has earned a considerable profit.  She is a hard worker, and also sells shoes by catalogue.  And she helps out at her sister's grocery store to earn a little extra money.  She enjoys making every effort to provide a better lifestyle for her 8-year-old daughter, Luisa.

Inés is content with the support from the foundation which has helped her get ahead and expand her business.  She has an elementary level education, so she wants her children to finish their education and have their own businesses and profits.

She is grateful to the Fundación Realidad and KIVA for all the support she received when it was needed most.

loans.use: To buy and sell chicken.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Pablo, tiene la edad de 32 años, está casado  y vive con sus 2 hijo y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos  para la mejora de su cafetal. El cuenta con el establecido ya de café y lo que quiere es realizarle las mejoras necesarias para obtener de él buenos resultados. El comprara abono para aplicarle al cultivo y así darle más fuerza a la planta a la hora de cosechar y mayor aguante del grano maduro mientras se recolecta el fruto. El quiere con esta mejora que le hará a su cafetal obtener resultados positivos y generar la ganancias establecidas por el y así darle a su familia un mejor nivel de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Pablo, 32, is married and lives with his wife and two children, who are his main priority.  He plans to use the loan to buy supplies to improve his coffee plantation.  He already has the plantation up and running, but wants to make the necessary improvements to obtain the best results.  He will buy fertilizer for his crop and make it stronger so the ripe beans will last longer during harvest.  He is hopeful this improvement will increase his income and profits so he can give his family a better lifestyle.  This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has never had a state bank loan before, but FUDECOSUR is giving him better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: To provide maintenance for his coffee crop.

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 13 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: 29 De Setiembre Group

texts.es:
El comité “29 de Setiembre” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan las actividades de forma conjunta y solidaria, dentro de un ambiente de colaboración y de respeto. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
La Señora Librada es una de las integrantes del comité, está casada, y tiene 1 hijo. Ella se dedica a la venta de varios comestibles, como ser arroz, azúcar, lácteos y demás. Por medio de estas ventas ella puede generar un poco de ingresos con lo cual puede paliar los gastos que cada día surgen en la casa. Comenta que todo el trabajo que hace es por darle un mejor futuro a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, fideos, azúcar, lácteos y demás productos para abastecerse y de esa forma poder cumplir con los pedidos de todos sus clientes. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
The group "29 de Setiembre" was formed when some neighbors in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso decided to come together. All of the members work together in solidarity in an environment of collaboration and respect. The members form a very unified group and together are capable of activities that strengthen their partnership.

Librada is one of the members of the group. She is married and has one son. She sells groceries like rice, sugar, dairy products and other things. Through these sales she is able to generate a little bit of income which helps to cover the day-to-day costs of her home. She tells us that all of the work that she does is to give her family a better future.

She asks for a loan to buy rice, noodles, sugar, dairy and other products to stock her store and be able to meet the orders of all of her customers. She thanks the Foundation for the opportunity that they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, sugar, dairy and other products.

loans.name: Edy Luz

texts.es:
Edy Luz tiene 50 años edad, tiene seis hijas y nació en la ciudad de Echarate  (La Convención, Cusco). La ciudad de Echarate es la ciudad capital del distrito de Echarate de la Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales.

Actualmente, Edy Luz vive en la ciudad Echarate y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Edy Luz es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora, responsable y amable que tiene un bar donde vende gaseosas y cervezas. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. La socia trabaja desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 12 de la  noche o hasta que los clientes se vayan. En esta oportunidad Edy Luz requiere el préstamo para comprar cervezas, gaseosas, agua mineral y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Edy Luz, 50, has six daughters and was born in the city of Charate (La Convención, Cusco).  Echarate is the capital city of the district of Echarate in the province of La Convención.  It is an important commercial center in the valleys of Lares and La Convención, where the main activities are coca plant, coffee, cocoa and fruit production.

Currently Edy Luz lives in the city of Echarate where she has her business.  She is a hard-working, entrepreneurial, responsible and kind woman who has a bar where she sells sodas and beer.  She has been in business for three years and it has gone well for her.  Her working hours are from 9:00 a.m. to 12:00 midnight, or till the last customer has gone.  Edy Luz wants to ue the loan to buy beer, sodas, mineral water and other items.

loans.use: To buy beer, sodas, mineral water and other items.

loans.name: Loukouman

texts.fr: Loukouman est marié à Aminatou, une revendeuse. Le couple a cinq enfants à charge, dont quatre sont les leurs. Les enfants sont tous scolarisés. Loukouman et sa femme vivent dans la même maison avec leurs enfants. Les diverses charges de la famille sont supportées par le couple. Loukouman a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire, puis a appris l'électronique ; activité qu’il exerce depuis dix sept ans et qui lui permet de satisfaire aux exigences de sa clientèle et d’assurer les diverses charges de sa famille. Loukouman désire agrandir son atelier en s’approvisionnant en matériels et en pièces de rechanges électroniques, ce qui lui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. Loukouman s’approvisionne au Nigeria, État voisin du Bénin. C’est la troisième fois que Loukouman demande l’appui  financier d’ALIDé, en vue de rehausser le niveau de son activité, d’accroître sa clientèle et son revenu. Les deux premiers crédits ont été tous bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Loukouman is married to Aminatou, a retailer. They have five children to support. Four of the children are their own but all are in school. He and his wife live in the same house with the children. The various family expenses are covered by the couple. 

Loukouman dropped out of secondary school and then learned about electronics. He has been doing this work for seventeen years, and it enables him to meet the requirements of his customers and to ensure that the various family expenses are covered. He would like to expand his workshop by stocking up on supplies and electronic replacement parts. This will allow him to satisfy customer demand better. He gets her supplies from Nigeria, a country neighboring Benin. 

This is the third time that he has asked for financial support from ALIDé with the aim of boosting his business and growing his customer base and his revenues. The first two loans have both been repaid completely.

loans.use: to buy electronic replacement parts

loans.name: Ana Martha

texts.es:
La  señora Martha solicitó el préstamo para comprar insumos para la elaboración de tamales.
Gracias a los préstamos la señora Martha  ha  cambiado su negocio no solo vende tamales también, antojitos mexicanos  en las noches su esposo Jesús le construyo una ramada compraron mesas y sillas para cuando vayan los clientes a comer.
Sin embargo al tener estos gastos ella necesita dinero para poder comprar mas insumos y seguir conb su negocio de tamales y de antojitos mexicanos.
La va muy bien en su negocio sus hijos Luis Antonio de  doce años de edad y Lourdes de  veinte un años, le ayudan en ir a comprar las cosas que  necesita y en atender a sus clientes.
Esta muy contenta  por que le va muy bien en su negocio, obtiene  muy buenas ganancias y puede ayudar a sus hijos para que terminen sus estudios.
Su mejor sueño es tener un restaurante y que sus hijos terminen de estudiar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martha has requested a loan to buy supplies for her tamale business.  Thanks to such loans Martha has been able to expand her business to include selling Mexican snacks at night.  Her husband, Jesús, built a covered area for her and they bought tables and chairs for customers to come and eat.

But because of these expenses she needs money to buy ingredients to continue with her business, which is doing well.  Her children, Luis Antonio, 12, and Lourdes, 20, help her shop for the things she needs and to attend customers.

She is content with how her business is doing since she earns a good profit, allowing her to help her children finish their education.  Her dream is to have her own restaurant and for her children to finish school.

loans.use: To buy flour, meat, chili peppers, etc., to make tamales.

loans.name: Bastella

texts.fr:
Femme âgée de 25ans, mariée avec deux enfants dont l’âge varie de 18 mois à 5ans. Elle est dans ce commerce de vente des poissons salés depuis l'an 2007 et ce commerce lui permet de s'occuper de la scolarité de sa fillette. Elle est au marché à partir de 8h du matin et quitte vers 16h de l'après midi. Elle a une clientèle très active et variée, car le Poisson salé est apprécié dans sa Zone d'activité. 

Ce prêt lui permettra d'améliorer la qualité de son activité en achetant 2 cartons de poissons salés, 2 cartons de poissons thons, 2 cartons morues, elle choisie toujours les meilleurs poissons pour agrandir son étalage.

Pour la croissance de son commerce, elle vend aux prix hors concurrence pour mieux attirer la clientèle, elle est une bonne gestionnaire. 

Dans son quartier et au marché, on la qualifie de brave femme, elle se bat pour l’éducation futur de ses enfants en leur offrant des études à l’étranger et s'organiser pour améliorer ses condition de vie.
texts.en:
This lady is 25 years old and married with two children aged between 18 months and 5 years old. She has sold salted fish since 2007 and this trade enables her to see to her young daughter's education. She trades from 8am until 4pm at the market and has an active and varied customer base, as salted fish is a popular delicacy in the area. This loan will enable her to improve the quality of her business by purchasing two crates of salted fish, 2 crates of tuna and 2 crates of cod. She always picks the best fish for her display. 

In order to grow the business she sells her wares at competitive prices to attract customers - she is an astute businesswoman. 

She is renowned as a strong woman in her quarter and at the market; she works tirelessly for her children's education and quality of life, and is hoping to send them abroad for some schooling.

loans.use: to purchase crates of salted fish and crates of tuna

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 14 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Carmen  tiene  cuarenta y ocho años de edad, ella se dedica a la  venta de ropa y venta de tortillas; es una señora  muy trabajadora, desde hace tres años se ha dedicado a vender ropa ya que con ello obtiene muy buenas ganancias y tiene muy buenos clientes pues ella es muy amable.

Le gusta mucho su negocio ya que cuenta con un local y todo gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de fundación realidad.

En las  mañanas se dedica a vender tortillas de manteca; vende de casa en casa le va muy bien en su pequeño negocio de tortillas, tiene  ya muchos clientes. Hay ocasiones que rápido las termina y vuelve hacer en las noches, le gusta tener su propio negocio y a si ayudar a su familia.

Ella estudio hasta  segundo  grado de la secundaria y le gustaría que sus hijos terminen sus estudios  para que puedan encontrar un mejor trabajo y hacerse  de un negocio.

Esta muy agradecida con fundación por el apoyo que le brindan.
texts.en:
Carmen is 48 years old.  She works selling clothing and tortillas.  She is a hard-working woman.  She has sold clothing for three years and she earns a very good income and has many customers because she is very friendly.  

She likes her business very much since it now has a store thanks to her efforts and the support of Fundación Realidad.

In the morning, she works selling tortillas.  She sells from house to house and does well with her small tortilla business.  She already has many customers. There are times when she finishes quickly and returns to do it at night.  She likes to have her own business so that she can help her family.

She studied until the second grade of secondary school and she would like for her children to finish their studies so that they can find a better job and have a business.

She is very thankful to the foundation for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to purchase and sell clothing.

loans.name: Jakeline Zarauz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “TAYTACHA SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORITY DE YUNGAQUI”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Yungaqui, Provincia de Anta, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jakeline; la socia tiene 29 años; la socia es soltera y tiene 1 hijos, de 8 años de edad;  La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de animales menores, la socia compra y vende vacas y toros; la socia desea comprar vacas  terneras, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de dos vacas terneras.  

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Introducing Jakeline, a member of “TAYTACHA SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORITY DE YUNGAQUI”, a Communal Bank located in Yungaqui, a district of the Anta province in the Cusco department.

Jakeline is 29 years old, she is single and she has an 8-year-old child. She engages in buying and selling small animals. She buys and sells cows and bulls, and she would like to buy calves. She is requesting a loan to buy 2 calves.

She is very satisfied with and thankful to the support she will receive through this loan, and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues according to the agreed schedule.

loans.use: To buy 2 calves.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos  en su casa que es propia, ubicada en Jauja. Sus padres le enseñaron las tareas del campo y en la actualidad la agricultura y la ganadería son su fuente de ingreso principal. Es así que trabaja con toda su familia para obtener las ganancias necesarias para ella y su familia. Los productos que cultiva son maíz, papa, arveja, cebada entre otros productos de su zona. En cuanto a la actividad ganadera que desarrolla, posee 8 vacas de las cuales extrae la leche para venderla diariamente y eso la de más ventaja en sus ingresos económicos. Po otro lado, para mantener la cantidad de animales que tiene, cultiva pastizales para alimentarlos. Su gran deseo es tener un establo ganadero bien implementado y con una cantidad considerable de cabezas de ganado. Considera que trabajar con MFP es una experiencia de vida positiva porque esta aprendiendo el valor de la solidaridad y del ahorro que se promueve en su grupo solidario a su vez que es más responsable en el pago de sus créditos. Con el dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono orgánico para sembrar papa y habas.
texts.en: Nancy lives with her husband and their 3 children in a house of their own located in Jauja. She has been raised in farm work by her parents, and nowadays agriculture and livestock breeding are her main sources of income. She works with her whole family to earn the money she and her family need. She grows maize, potatoes, peas and barley among other products of her area. As for the breeding activity, she owns 8 cows that produce milk she daily sells, thus adding up to her incomes. On the other hand, to maintain the quantity of animals she owns, she grows pasture to feed them. Her main desire is to own a well-supplied dairy farm with a significant number of heads of cattle. She thinks that working with MFP is a positive life experience because she is being taught the values of solidarity and savings, promoted in and by her solidarity group, and in her turn she is more responsible in the repayment of her loans. The loan she is now requesting will be used to buy bags of manure to plant potatoes and broad beans.

loans.use: To buy bags of manure.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es: Marvin, tiene la edad de 49 años, esta soltero  y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de insumos para la siembra de café. Marvin cuenta  con un terreno que reúne las condiciones para la explotación cafetalera por lo cual el realizara la siembra de plantas de café en ese terreno. El sembrara las plantas y aplicara todos los insumos necesarios para el buen mantenimiento de la plantación y así poderle  sacar las mayores ganancias en la cosecha del grano maduro. El espera de este nuevo proyecto obtener ganancias para poderle dar a su familia un nivel de vida diferente y el sustento diario.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marvin, 49, is single and lives with his son and daughter-in-law, who are his top priority. With the loan he plants to buy inputs for planting cafe. Marvin has some land that has the necessary conditions for growing coffee which is why he plants coffee on that land. He will sow the plants and will apply all of the necessary inputs for the maintenance of the plantation which will allow him to get greater profits from the harvest of the mature beans.

He hopes that this new project will bring in more income so that he can give his family a different quality of life and daily sustenance. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given him the loan much more easily and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant coffee.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “TAYTACHA SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORITY DE YUNGAQUI”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Yungaqui, Provincia de Anta, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lorenza; la socia tiene 41 años; la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos, de 21, 16, 14, 4 años de edad;  La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de animales menores, la socia cría aves de corral, cuyes, chanchos,  también la socia se dedica a la compra de vacas, toros,  la socia ahora invertirá su dinero en la compra de vacas terneras lecheras para de ellas extraer leche y vender leche fresca, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de vacas terneras 2 o 3 vacas tiernas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de de 2 o 3 vacas terneras.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Introducing Lorenza, a member of “TAYTACHA SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORITY DE YUNGAQUI”, a Communal Bank located in Yungaqui, a district of the Anta province in the Cusco department.

Lorenza is 41 years old and she has 4 children aged 21, 16, 14 and 4. She engages in buying and selling small animals, breeding poultry, “cuyes” (“cuy” is Quechua for Guinea pig) and pigs. She also engage in buying cows and bulls. She will invest her loan in the purchase of calves and dairy cows to get fresh milk to sell. She is requesting a loan to buy 2 or 3 calves. She is requesting a loan to invest it in the purchase of 2 or 3 calves.

She is very satisfied with and thankful to the support she will receive through this loan, and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues according to the agreed schedule.

loans.use: To buy 2 or 3 calves.

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 15 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché. Les revenus tirés de la vente du manioc leur permettra de renforcer leur commerce mais aussi de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (paiement des frais de scolarité les frais médicaux et participer a l’entretien de la maison).
texts.en:
This is a group composed of five members who live in Pire, a village located 100 kilometers from Dakar, the capital of Senegal. Their main business activity involves trading with farm products, such as cassava tubers. The group members are experienced in this field and have a strong customer base. The workday starts at 8 a.m. and ends around 8 p.m.

With this financing, the group members intend to buy 100 sacks of cassava that they will resell at the market. The income earned from the sale of cassava will enable them to strengthen their business and provide for their children (school fees, healthcare and household expenses).

loans.use: to buy cassava, groundnuts and millet.

loans.name: Gladys Yoni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladys Yoni; ella tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas, ella tiene un triciclo donde vende caramelos, galletas, chupetes y gaseosas, ella trabaja en forma ambulatoria, ella trabaja de lunes a domingo, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de golosinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas como caramelos, galletas y gaseosas para implementar su triciclo.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Gladys Yoni, a member of “MAMA SIMONA”, a Communal Bank located in districts, province and department of Cusco.

Gladys Yoni is 30 years old, she lives with her life partner and has 2 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retail activity: she sells sweets. She owns a three-wheeled vehicle she uses to sell candies, biscuits, lollipops and fizzy drinks. She is a street vendor, and she works Mondays to Fridays. Thanks to this activity she is Abel to provide for her children. She would like to improve and increase her sweet selling activity. She is requesting a loan to buy sweets such as candies, biscuits and fizzy drinks to stock up her vehicle.

She is happy about the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of his dues.

loans.use: To buy candies, biscuits and fizzy drinks to stock up her vehicle.

loans.name: And Soukali Jeeguene Pire 16 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 5 membres qui habitent dans le village de Pire à cent km de DAKAR la capitale du Sénégal, leur activité principale est le commerce de produits agricoles  les tubercules de manioc. Elles sont expérimentées dans le domaine et disposent  d’une bonne  clientèle. Leur journée commence à 8 heures du matin et se  termine vers 20heures du soir. Avec ce financement elles comptent  acheter 100 sacs de manioc qu’elles vont revendre  au marché.
